data.title: G5 Entertainment Appoints Nomination Committee for 2026 AGM
data.description:
An announcement from G5 Entertainment AB ( (SE:G5EN) ) is now available.

G5 Entertainment AB has appointed a Nomination Committee ahead of its 2026 Annual General Meeting, consisting of representatives from its five largest shareholders as of August 2025. This committee will play a crucial role in shaping the company’s governance by selecting board members, potentially impacting the company’s strategic direction and stakeholder interests.

The most recent analyst rating on (SE:G5EN) stock is a Buy with a SEK105.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on G5 Entertainment AB stock, see the SE:G5EN Stock Forecast page.

More about G5 Entertainment AB

G5 Entertainment AB is a developer and publisher of high-quality free-to-play games for smartphones, tablets, and personal computers. The games are designed to be family-friendly and easy to learn, appealing to a broad audience of both experienced and novice players. The company’s portfolio includes popular titles such as Jewels of Rome®, Sherlock: Hidden Match-3 Cases, and Hidden City®. G5 Entertainment is publicly listed on Nasdaq Stockholm’s main market mid cap segment under the trade symbol G5EN.ST.

Average Trading Volume: 27,211

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: SEK765.3M

Learn more about G5EN stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Trustpilot Announces Total Voting Rights Update
data.description:
An announcement from Trustpilot Group Plc ( (GB:TRST) ) is now available.

Trustpilot Group Plc has announced that its issued ordinary share capital comprises 405,493,337 ordinary shares, each with one voting right, and no shares held in treasury. This update allows shareholders to calculate their interests in accordance with the FCA’s Disclosure Guidance and Transparency Rules.

data.title: Star Fashion Culture Delays Yearly Report Filing
data.description:
Star Fashion Culture Holdings Ltd. Class A has announced a delay in filing its Form 20-F (Yearly Report) for the financial period ending June 30, 2025. The primary reason for the delay is the difficulty in obtaining and compiling the necessary information, which could not be resolved without unreasonable effort and expense. The company anticipates that the report will be filed within fifteen calendar days following the prescribed due date. There are no expected significant changes in financial results from the previous fiscal year, and forward-looking statements have not been indicated. The company is committed to ongoing compliance efforts, as evidenced by the notification signed by CEO Liu Xiaohua.

More about Star Fashion Culture Holdings Ltd. Class A

Average Trading Volume: 7,509,530

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Sell

Current Market Cap: $2.24M

Learn more about STFS stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Greentech Technology Appoints Internal Control Consultant for Trading Resumption
data.description:
Greentech Technology International Limited ( (HK:0195) ) just unveiled an update.

Greentech Technology International Limited has appointed OCF Corporate Advisory Limited as an internal control consultant to conduct an independent review of its internal controls, a necessary step for the resumption of trading in the company’s shares. This appointment is part of the company’s efforts to comply with the Resumption Guidance, following a suspension of trading due to delays in publishing financial results. The draft report from the internal control review is expected by the end of December 2025, with a final report to follow shortly thereafter.

More about Greentech Technology International Limited

Greentech Technology International Limited is a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands, operating with limited liability. It is listed on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong and is involved in various activities through its subsidiaries.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: HK$382.5M

data.title: Valterra Platinum Director Sells Shares Worth £429,300
data.description:
An announcement from Valterra Platinum Limited ( (AGPPF) ) is now available.

Valterra Platinum Limited announced a significant transaction involving the sale of 9,000 ordinary shares by Hendrik Faul, a non-executive director. The shares were sold on the market at a price of £47.70 each, totaling £429,300. This transaction reflects the ongoing dealings in securities by company insiders, which may influence market perceptions and investor confidence.

More about Valterra Platinum Limited

Valterra Platinum Limited is a leading integrated producer of platinum group metals (PGMs), with primary operations in South Africa and Zimbabwe. The company is listed on both the Johannesburg and London Stock Exchanges and is known for its efficient processing assets and long-life mines. Valterra Platinum focuses on sustainability, market development, and delivering superior returns to shareholders while maintaining a strong commitment to community impact and zero harm.

For a thorough assessment of AGPPF stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: International Endeavors Plans Name Change to ModuLink
data.description:
International Endeavors ( (IDVV) ) has issued an update.

On October 26, 2025, International Endeavors Corporation announced its filing of an amendment to change its corporate name to ModuLink Inc. and increase its authorized common stock shares from 4 billion to 6 billion. This amendment is subject to review by the SEC and FINRA, with potential delays due to regulatory reviews and possible legal actions from stockholders. The company plans to maintain compliance with SEC disclosure requirements and will update shareholders as key regulatory steps are completed.

More about International Endeavors

International Endeavors Corporation, operating under the brand name ModuLink, is involved in property development using modular integrated construction technology. The company integrates proprietary atmospheric water generators and IoT-based property management systems to create sustainable and intelligent properties for various markets, including residential, commercial, industrial, and remote environments.

Current Market Cap: $2.38M

For a thorough assessment of IDVV stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Corcel PLC Adopts New Incentive Plans to Align Leadership and Shareholder Interests
data.description:
Corcel ( (GB:CRCL) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Corcel PLC has announced the adoption of a Founder Share Plan (FSP) and a Share Option Plan (SOP) aimed at recruiting, retaining, and incentivizing its directors and senior staff. These plans are designed to align the interests of the leadership team with shareholders by linking rewards to the creation of shareholder value. The FSP and SOP have been developed with independent expert advice and feedback from major shareholders, ensuring they align with market practices. The company is also considering establishing an employee benefit trust to support these plans and limit shareholder dilution.

data.title: AMTD Digital Inc. Reports Massive Revenue Growth for First Half of 2025
data.description:
AMTD IDEA Group ( (AMTD) ) just unveiled an update.

AMTD Digital Inc. reported a significant 1,085.9% increase in revenue for the six months ending April 30, 2025, compared to the same period in 2024. This growth is attributed to the consolidation of The Generation Essentials Group (TGE) and expansion in its hospitality, media, and entertainment sectors. The company’s total assets amounted to $899.1 million, with net assets at $548.0 million. The integration of TGE has bolstered AMTD Digital’s strategic positioning in the market, demonstrating resilience and potential for future opportunities. This financial performance reflects the company’s commitment to delivering long-term value to shareholders and expanding its global footprint.

The most recent analyst rating on (AMTD) stock is a Hold with a $1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on AMTD IDEA Group stock, see the AMTD Stock Forecast page.

AMTD IDEA Group’s overall stock score is driven by its strong valuation, indicating potential undervaluation, and robust profitability margins. However, the declining revenue and cash flow challenges, coupled with neutral technical indicators, suggest caution. The absence of earnings call and corporate events data limits further insights.

To see Spark’s full report on AMTD stock, click here.

More about AMTD IDEA Group

AMTD Digital Inc., a subsidiary of AMTD IDEA Group, is a comprehensive digital solutions platform headquartered in France. The company operates key business lines including digital media, content and marketing services, investments, as well as hospitality and VIP services.

data.title: Jakks Pacific Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
data.description:
